data.text: @MerlinofCanada @elaineel_79 Honest question re testing rates: Are patients always tested on admission for Covid and included in the stats?  Or would they be treated for symptoms and perhaps not be included in stats?  So the Covid hosp/ICU #’s may be higher? @drdagly @DGlaucomflecken

@fayewest66 @MerlinofCanada Yes my mistake 

@JasonKenney making Alberta great again I see. My heart goes out to anyone suffering with covid & those in the hospital. Everyone deserves better than this. Health care workers have been abandoned & he thumbs his nose at them.
@BiancaTheBrave @MerlinofCanada @jasonkenney You tagged the wrong Jason Kenney.
@MerlinofCanada Maybe he will go to the Ukraine for vacation one can only hope they would probably send him back
@mordevtris I know it is a head shaker

@MerlinofCanada Ignoring a virus will not make it go away.

Can't believe I actually have to say this.
@MerlinofCanada And this is supposed to be normal?  SMH 🤦‍♀️ I will be masking for the foreseeable future even though I’m triple vaccinated 💉
@MerlinofCanada no test, no data.  covid is done /s
@Tikisrose @MerlinofCanada Kenney's a moron who cares about no one but himself
